question: Can you help me plan a road trip from New York to Los Angeles, covering the best attractions along the way?
true_answer: A detailed road trip plan from New York to Los Angeles, covering major attractions, has been provided.

steps.description: Research major cities and attractions between New York and Los Angeles
Analyze best routes and verify attraction details

plan.current_objective: Create a comprehensive road trip itinerary

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Major attractions include Niagara Falls, Chicago's Millennium Park, Route 66 landmarks, Grand Canyon.

steps.content: Can you help me plan a road trip from New York to Los Angeles, covering the best attractions along the way?
Creating initial plan: 1) Interpret query. 2) Decompose into research and analysis tasks. 3) Assign to sub-agents.
Decomposing task into sub-tasks: research major cities and attractions, analyze best routes, compile itinerary.
Assigning research on major cities and attractions to researcher agent.
Searching for major cities and attractions along the route from New York to Los Angeles.
Major attractions identified: Niagara Falls, Chicago, Route 66 stops, Grand Canyon.
Updating plan: Mark research on major cities and attractions as completed.
Assigning analysis of best routes and verification of attraction details to analyzer agent.
Analyzing best routes from New York to Los Angeles, verifying details of attractions.
Route analysis complete: Best route includes key attraction stops verified.
Feedback to planner: Route and attraction details verified and optimized.
Updating plan based on analyzer's feedback.
Assigning the task of compiling a detailed itinerary to principal agent.
Compiling final itinerary: Detailed stops and routes from New York to Los Angeles.
Final itinerary compiled: Includes major attractions and optimized routes.
Updating memory with itinerary and attraction details.
Deleting plan as task is completed.
